price: Janganlah kamu sembah di samping (menyembah) Allah, tuhan apa pun yang lain. Tidak ada Tuhan (yang berhak disembah), melainkan Dia.  Tiap-tiap sesuatu pasti binasa, kecuali wajah-Nya (Allah). Bagi-Nya-lah segala penentuan dan hanya kepada-Nya-lah kamu dikembalikan.
arabic: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ كُلُّ شَيۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجۡهَهُۥۚ لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara lā ilāha illā huwa kullu shayin hālikun illā wajhahu lahu al-ḥuk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
